mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.match_name AS "matchName", a.status_code AS "statusCode", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.match_key AS "matchKey", a.process_id AS "processId", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.reward AS "reward", a.signup_count AS "signupCount", a.tags AS "tags", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.match_abs AS "matchAbs", a.logo AS "logo", a.forum_url AS "forumUrl", a.routine AS "routine"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ps_match( match_name, status_code, create_time, update_time, match_key, process_id, project_id, reward, signup_count, tags, start_time, end_time, match_abs, logo, forum_url, routine ) VALUES ( #{matchName}, #{statusCode}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{matchKey}, #{processId}, #{projectId}, #{reward}, #{signupCount}, #{tags}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{matchAbs}, #{logo}, #{forumUrl}, #{routine} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ps_match SET match_name = #{matchName}, status_code = #{statusCode}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, match_key = #{matchKey}, process_id = #{processId}, project_id = #{projectId}, reward = #{reward}, signup_count = #{signupCount}, tags = #{tags}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, match_abs = #{matchAbs}, logo = #{logo}, forum_url = #{forumUrl}, routine = #{routine} WHERE id = #{id}
